customConfigJson:
{
    "wordcount": {
        "showRemaining": true,
        "showParagraphs": true,
        "showWordCount": true,
        "showCharCount": true,
        "countBytesAsChars": false,
        "countSpacesAsChars": false,
        "countHTML": false,
        "countLineBreaks": false,
        "hardLimit": true,
        "warnOnLimitOnly": false,
        "maxWordCount": -1,
        "maxCharCount": -1,
        "maxParagraphs": -1,
        "pasteWarningDuration": 0
    }
}
